media-feature.tooltip: The view-mode media feature describes the mode in which the Web application is being shown as a running application on the platform.

name.tooltip: Describes a Web application running in a windowed manner, which is to say with chrome and without occupying the entire screen area.
Describes a Web application providing a more immersive interface, running in a windowed manner but without chrome.
Describes a Web application that is occupying the entirety of the display.
Describes a Web application that is occupying the entirety of the screen area but with chrome.
Describes a Web application docked or otherwise minimized.
